span.strong: Please donate to Dohn’s Technology 2020 Fundraising Campaign!

em.span: PURPOSE: Refurbished devices with internet access

ul.li: Students without access due to inequities
99% students African American and 98% live at or below poverty line
Online learning is the new normal

h4.span: You Can Make a Difference Towards Student’s Success!

p.strong:
UPDATED 4/20/20
•Seniors – Keep your Focus on Graduation
•Google tutorials below

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_row et_pb_row_2 et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters2
et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: “Dohn continues to serve every one of our students.” ~ Mr. Davenport
• Online Class Schedule (View schedule)

• Online Google Classroom:
https://classroom.google.com
• Credit Recovery Packet Pickup FOR SENIORS: see DOHN SENIORS BOX on this page for more details.
• Your Counselor is your school contact through these last two months of school: Stay in touch with your counselor! (Counselor List)
• HEALTH EXPERTS REPORT THAT SHELTERING IN PLACE IS WORKING – Keep up the great work! Stay healthy, take care of one another, and remain Dohn Strong!

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: • All students: For your Online Class schedule & Dohn Panther email address contact your counselor (Counselor List)
• Seniors: For credit recovery packet information contact your counselor (Counselor List)

p.strong: • For APEX reset, contact your building coordinator:

div.p:
Melrose: Harry Raimey hraimey@dohncincy.org
KTMIS: Ania Nelson anelson@dohncincy.org
South: Tasha Allen tallen@dohncincy.org
West: Cassie Hunter chunter@dohncincy.org
North: Eric Randolph erandolph@dohncincy.org
Colerain: Jonathan Williams jwilliams@dohncincy.org
Workbridge: Donna Foster dfoster@dohncincy.org
Main: ksargent@dohncincy.org, or lmckenzie@dohncincy.org
• For IEPs email Ms. Willis: swillis@dohncincy.org or call 513-497-7882.
• Google Classroom Account Login Information: contact your counselor (Counselor List)

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

img.alt: Join Dohn Panther Pride Facebook group page
Join Dohn Panther Pride Facebook group page

div.p: Please keep in touch regarding the latest developments through our Dohn Panther Pride Facebook Group page. This is for students, parents, and teachers. You will need to “request to join the group” if you aren’t a part of it already.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_6 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p:
Thank you for your interest in Dohn Community High School! We have major success in educating our youth, and we are eager to welcome your student and you into Dohn’s family.
Click HERE for enrollment information, details, and packets.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

strong.br: Here are two Google Classroom online tutorials done by Amy Vonderhaar.

div.p: • Laptop Tutorial Link – https://youtu.be/z2Zwn3gh05U
• Cell Phone Tutorial Link – https://youtu.be/P1MPlntSDQQ

span.strong: If your teacher gave you a code:

ol.li: When you get the code from your teacher or counselor, go to classroom.google.com
Sign in to your google account.
Click the + sign, select”join class” and enter the code

span.strong: • If your teacher gave you an invitation:

ol.li: Go to gmail.com and sign up to your school Google account
Open the invitation and click the button to join the class
Go to Google Classroom (classroom.google.com) and sign-in to your school google account.
Click the button to join the class

strong.span: • For students using phones to access online learning:

div.p: Go the the App Store on your phone.
Search for Hangouts Meet by Google LLC. The graphic image looks like this:

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

div.p: Install the free app on your phone. Once you have installed the app, you can access the live classroom on your phone.

p.strong: Please ask your counselors for help if needed:

em.strong: Here are links if you need more help:

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_8 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

a.title: Waggle offers free breakfast to children under 18
internet options, some of them free
get help paying utility bills
a.em: • Energy Assistance Programs: Help with paying your utility bills

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_9 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p:
• Schedule for PACKET pick up & drop off:
Every Monday, Tuesday & Thursday
10:00am – 1:00pm

p.span: • As you pick-up and drop-off packets MAINTAIN Social Distancing — one student at a time, six feet apart.
• You will sign out the packets that you pick-up and you will sign in the packets you return.

div.p: • Your counselors are your point of contact for questions, and your teachers can help when you have questions about the course content of the packet. (Counselor List)

strong.em: Everyone at Dohn is working on your behalf!

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_10 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

p.span: Continue with Apex & Online learning through Google Classrooms.

strong.em: Attendance will be taken, and you will have a regular school schedule.

p.span: Counselors can help you with your Dohn Panther email address to access the online classes.(Counselor List)

strong.span: EVERYONE AT DOHN WANTS YOU TO SUCCEED! Let your counselor know what you need. (Counselor List)

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_11 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

h3.strong:
Students, Teachers, & Staff…
You Got This!!
